row_list: Dataset with themes for the TOMLA mobile app.

There are 5 example themes in this dataset: Royal Orange (default theme), 2 camouflage
themes (Camo green theme and Desert brownish theme) a fashionable Dark theme and a yellow
and black Tweety theme (inspired by Search & Rescue helicopters and road service vehicles).
This spreadsheet is converted with the tfg.py conversion script. See the TOMLA Manual!
Dataset with translations for the TOMLA mobile app.

There are 4 default base languages: EN (English), F (French), D (German) and NL (Dutch).
The translations are for all display texts and 2 built-in manuals (Quick Start Guide + User Manual).
English is used as the default language when a variable or translation for a variable is missing.
This spreadsheet is converted with the tfg.py conversion script. See the TOMLA Manual!
